chapter.title: Provide an extension point
chapter.para: Now, you created your extension and you would like to provide extension point. For this :

listitem.para: Create a public method with as the first parameter the type of the expected extensions and, if you want to get extension properties, as the second parameter a Dictionary :
listitem.programlisting:
public void addExtension(ExpectedExtensionType extension, Dictionary properties) {
}

listitem.para: Annotate this method with @Link and give an extension point alias
You just produce the extension point yourClassName.ext
Now, all extensions contributing to this extension point will be given as first parameter to addExtension() method
If you want to be notified when the extension is no longer available, create a public method with the same parameters types as addExtension() method and annotate it with @Unlink("ext")
